attributes.action: call the bluff of the non-doms and immediately remove their favourable tax status, backdated 10 years so they can then be taxed at standard rates on everything they've earned in that time, before they leave the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We cannot be held to ransom by people who are making huge fortunes while the poorly paid of the country are being required to pay more tax than the rich who are now paying less tax.
